content: Hi @maintainers, I am a student of Heather Macbeth and I have been working on some lemmas about the dihedral_group and homomorphism. May I please have permission to push this as a branch in preparation for a PR? My Github username is shadas_ali.
@Shadman Sakib Could you double-check your GitHub username? It says "Could not find a GitHub account matching shadas_ali".
Looks like someone beat me to the invitation: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/invitations
